mdx.excerpt: Introduction The AWS Distro for OpenTelemetry (ADOT) Swift Auto-Instrumentation Agent can be installed onto any iOS application running on iOS 16+ to gatherâ€¦

frontmatter.title: Auto-Instrumentation for Traces and RUM Events with the Swift Agent
frontmatter.description: Learn how to get started with Swift Auto-Instrumentation Agent. The agent automatically initializes the OpenTelemetry SDK at application startup to collect tracing and RUM event data.

headings.value: Configuring the agent with AWS CloudWatch RUM
Telemetry you get out of the box
